column2: [[["total", "[ACT_work_done_score] + [ACT_shortness_of_breath_score] + [ACT_symptoms_score] + [ACT_rescue_inhaler_score] + [ACT_control_score]", "ACT Total", 0.0, "", ""], [["asthma symptoms may not be as well controlled as they could be.", "#000000", "<", 19.0], ["asthma symptoms may be very poorly controlled.", "#000000", "<", 15.0]]]]
